mapper.select: select T2.id, T2.source typesName, count(T1.source) typesNum from (select source_1 source from anime_main union all select source_2 source from anime_main union all select source_3 source from anime_main) T1 right join anime_source T2 on T1.source = T2.id group by T2.source ORDER BY count(T1.source) DESC;

select T2.id, T2.type typesName, count(T1.type) typesNum from (select type_1 type from anime_main union all select type_2 type from anime_main union all select type_3 type from anime_main) T1 right join anime_type T2 on T1.type = T2.id group by T2.type order by count(T1.type) DESC;
SELECT T2.id, T2.love typesName, count(T1.love) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_love T2 ON T1.love = T2.id GROUP BY T2.love ORDER BY count(T1.love) DESC;
SELECT T2.id, T2.sex_limit typesName, count(T1.sex_limit) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_sexlimit T2 ON T1.sex_limit = T2.id GROUP BY T2.sex_limit ORDER BY count(T1.sex_limit) DESC;
SELECT T2.id, T2.`create` typesName, count(T1.`create`) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_create T2 ON T1.`create` = T2.id GROUP BY T2.`create` ORDER BY count(T1.`create`) DESC;

SELECT T2.id, T2.leader_gender typesName, count(T1.leader_gender) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_leadergender T2 ON T1.leader_gender = T2.id GROUP BY T2.leader_gender ORDER BY count(T1.leader_gender) DESC;

SELECT T2.id, T2.animation_end typesName, count(T1.animation_end) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_animationend T2 ON T1.animation_end = T2.id GROUP BY T2.animation_end ORDER BY count(T1.animation_end) DESC;

SELECT T2.id, T2.original_end typesName, count(T1.original_end) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_originalend T2 ON T1.original_end = T2.id GROUP BY T2.original_end ORDER BY count(T1.original_end) DESC;

SELECT T2.id, T2.layout_type typesName, count(T1.layout_type_id) typesNum FROM anime_layout T1 right join anime_layout_type T2 ON T1.layout_type_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.layout_type_id ORDER BY count(T1.layout_type_id) DESC;

SELECT T2.id, T2.binge_watching_type typesName, count(T1.binge_watching_type) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_bingewatchingtype T2 ON T1.binge_watching_type = T2.id GROUP BY T2.binge_watching_type ORDER BY count(T1.binge_watching_type) DESC;
SELECT T2.id, T2.status typesName, count(T1.status) typesNum FROM anime_main T1 right join anime_status T2 ON T1.status = T2.id GROUP BY T2.status ORDER BY count(T1.status) DESC;
SELECT T2.id, T2.type typesName, count(T1.type) typesNum FROM music_main T1 right join music_type T2 ON T1.type = T2.id GROUP BY T2.type ORDER BY count(T1.type) DESC;
SELECT ifnull(T1.score, '未定') typesName, count(ifnull(T1.score, '未定')) typesNum FROM music_main T1 GROUP BY ifnull(T1.score, '未定') ORDER BY count(ifnull(T1.score, '未定')) DESC;
SELECT T2.id, T2.type typesName, count(T1.type) typesNum FROM hanime_main T1 right join hanime_type T2 ON T1.type = T2.id GROUP BY T2.type ORDER BY count(T1.type) DESC;

SELECT ifnull(T1.dimensional, '未定') typesName, count(ifnull(T1.dimensional, '未定')) typesNum FROM hanime_main T1 GROUP BY ifnull(T1.dimensional, '未定') ORDER BY count(ifnull(T1.dimensional, '未定')) DESC;
